articles.description: The Falcon 9 rocket, carrying 21 of SpaceX's new Starlink "V2 mini" satellites took off at 10:31 a.m. ET from the premises of the Space Launch Complex 40.
articles.content: SpaceX successfully launched another batch of Starlink satellites on Wednesday, April 19. The Falcon 9 rocket, carrying  21 of SpaceX's new Starlink "V2 mini" satellites took off at 10:31 a.m. ET fro… [+2044 chars]
